EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2017-12-21-Field-East-ESB-Boston.ES-2017 - (6 Weeks Out) Boston.EMAIL - Mark
EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: Bruins v. Jets Executive Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://turbonomic.com/learn-boston]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're getting ready to host an exclusive event with our friends at Cisco as the Boston Bruins take on the Winnipeg Jets. At Turbonomic, our users are the core of our organization. They drive the evolution of our technology, shape our company culture, and even inspired out name change from VMTurbo to Turbonomic last August. Join us and our COO, Mark Thurmond this holiday season to learn about what it means to be a Turbonomic customer. Boston Bruins vs Winnipeg Jets
Where: TD Garden 100 Legends Way, Boston MA, 02117 Thursday, December 21st 5:00pm
Save the date for December 21st at 5:00PM by registering at the following link: http://turbonomic.com/learn-boston <[[http://turbonomic.com/learn-boston]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
